description:
For more than 35 years, our legal team at The Law Offices of Frederick W. Nessler and Associates, Ltd., has provided personal injury representation to people in Chicago, Illinois, as well as in Springfield, Decatur, Lincoln, Champaign and Rockford. We also have an office location in Denver, Colorado. Our attorneys strive to help you obtain the maximum financial compensation, including damages for your lost income, pain and suffering, and medical expenses.

 

Beginning with a free initial consultation, our attorneys work with you to understand your situation, injuries and needs. Placing an emphasis on communication, the professionals at our law offices make every effort to return your calls within 24 hours so that you are never left with unanswered questions or unaddressed concerns. It is our goal to help you achieve prompt results, so that you are able to focus on what matters most, your recovery.

 

We have experience handling an array of issues, including the following: automobile and trucking accidents, drunk driving injuries, texting while driving car accidents, uninsured drivers, products liability, medical malpractice, nursing home neglect, workers’ compensation, mesothelioma and asbestos, institutional sexual abuse and clergy abuse. Our attorneys accept cases involving injuries both minor and catastrophic, as well as wrongful deaths, and we have obtained numerous million-dollar and multimillion-dollar awards on behalf of our clients.

 

Going up against a large insurance company or navigating the legal system may seem intimidating, especially when you are dealing with an injury. Our attorneys at The Law Offices of Frederick W. Nessler and Associates, Ltd., negotiate on your behalf and help you tell your side of the story. We work to ensure you are compensated fairly, whether through an insurance settlement or a jury award.
